reviewText: for me this dvd just made sense and made me see i would enjoy allens program.  It shows he has reasoning behind his approach and it helps people who may not have a training or behavior background learn how to communicate better.

Shaping Behaviors fills a large gap in the horse training material available on the market today. It's a great resource for not only learning specific techniques to train tricks, but also for learning the principles behind those techniques so that you can apply them to just about any other training situation you can think of. This one's a winner. You won't be disappointed.
